20020001.text: I'm trying to find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>. Do you know where they are?

20020002.text: Why do you want to know? From what I've heard, the thugs who ruined the Martial Arts Championship at Sapphire Basin have been looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>, too. You're not one of them, are you?

20020004.text:
Enough! Get out of here!
Things are hard enough as it is, with the shortage of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>... And now we have to deal with these ruffians, too...

20020005.text:
Where are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>? I'm not so sure...
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> are a secretive organization, after all. I doubt anyone really knows their location.

20020006.text: But I thought they were pretty close with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.

20020007.text: They used to be. When we were first pioneering Haewol, we <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> worked closely together.

20020008.text: But due to some incidents, we've grown more distant, and now we walk our own paths.

20020010.text: But why are you looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>?

20020011.text: J-just out of curiosity. Thank you!

20020013.text: I'd like a roll of tough silk.

20020014.text:
Oh, I'm sorry, but we just ran out of tough silk...
How about this common silk?

20020015.text: If it's not tough silk, I'm not interested.

20020016.text: The thing is, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> have been very hard to come by lately.

20020017.text:
That's none of my concern.
If you don't have any, then I'll take my leave. See you next time.

20020018.text: Wait, aren't you the ones who've been looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>?

20020020.text: Scram, get out of here! Nothing good can come out of mingling with your kind.

20020022.text: Didn't you hear me? Go away!

20020023.text: Hm... It's going to be difficult to gather information.

20020024.text: How about we bring him <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>?

20020025.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spider webs</>? A-ha! You want to bring him some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> and ask for information in return? Good idea!

20020026.text: All right! We should be able to find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cobweb Forest Trail</>. Let's go!

20020027.text: Where did you get these <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>? Hmm, what do you want?

20020028.text: I think you already know the answer to that. Where do I find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>?

20020029.text: That's... Ugh, fine then, I'll tell you. But don't blame me if something bad happens.

20020031.text:
...If you want to find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>, go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>.
They'll be there.

20020034.text: You said you needed <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>, right?

20020036.text:
I won't just give them away for free.
I want to go to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>. How do I find them?

20020037.text: Hmm... Ah, fine. I'll tell you.

20020039.text: You'll find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>. But, I won't take any responsibility for what dangers you might run into there.

20020040.text: Don't worry, we can take care of ourselves. Thank you!

20020041.text: Oh... I was not expecting to meet you here.

20020043.text:
What's the meaning of this?
Wasn't attacking our leader enough? Are you trying to spy on our clan now, too?

20020045.text: Why have you been asking around about us?

20020046.text: Because there's something we need that only the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>leader of the Edeta</> can perform.

20020049.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</>? If this is a joke, it isn't funny... 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</> is an Advocate. You can't meet her just because you want to.

20020050.text:
But there is a way, right?
I'm aware of the fact that the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> conducts <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>rituals</> to receive revelations from their Advocate, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</>.

20020051.text:
That... That's not possible.
The ritual can only be conducted by our leader. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</> is currently in self-isolation and refuses to meet with anyone.

20020052.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</> is still the leader? I thought she ran away.

20020054.text: Do you not know who <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</> really is?

20020055.text: I don't understand what you're implying.

20020056.text:
Hmm... Really? All right! Listen, we'll fill you in on Harum's true identity.
But in return, you'll help us meet <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</>. Deal?

20020057.text: I'm telling you, we can't just hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</> like that...

20020058.text: Fine, fine. Then, we meet again when it's ready!

20020059.text: So, we just need to prepare the materials for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>, right? But what do we need?

20020061.text:
Uh oh... so we need to find that out first. I'm sure the Barons of Soul Bridge know something about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>.
Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Opulent Forest Base</>.

20020063.text: Meowww! You scared me! What is it?

20020064.text: Soul Bridge knows about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual to call the Advocate</>, right?

20020065.text:
Of course I know about it. The method's been passed down fur generations!
But... how do you know about it, mrrow?

20020066.text: Because I've had one done for me before.

20020067.text: Meow? You had a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</> done for you?

20020068.text: Uh, forget what I said. Anyway, what are the necessary materials?

20020069.text: Hmm... your attitude is fur-ustrating. I don't wanna tell you, hiss!

20020071.text: Well now I won't tell it to you for free! I don't like vewy rude people, hiss!

20020073.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, wait a sec. What do you want?

20020074.text: Seems like you're the more a-purr-oachable one! Here's the deal, meow. If you bring me <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>, I'll tell you about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>.

20020075.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>? Where am I supposed to get a weed like that?

20020076.text: What do you mean by weed!?

20020077.text: I'm sure he didn't mean that. Where can they be found?

20020078.text:
Hmph. You can get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</> from the Peach Blossom.
Well, I'll be waiting right here fur you, meow.

20020079.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>?
Haha, we usually get shipments pretty often because the Barons are quite fond of it.

20020080.text: Really!? So how much is it!?

20020081.text:
Well... things are a bit different nowadays.
We weren't able to get any <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</> recently because of the storm.

20020083.text: Yes, that's right. We have no <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>. Heh.

20020084.text:
Ah... I didn't think you'd be so disappointed... Ah, fine.
I have a little that I've been stashing for an emergency. I'll trade it for some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Greenhorn’s Horns</>.

20020085.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Greenhorn’s Horns</>! Okay, where can I get those?

20020087.text: All right. Hang tight, I'll be right back!

20020090.text: Oops, sowwy... I got a little distracted. I'll keep my promise, meow.

20020091.text: For the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</> to call an Advocate, you need a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell</> that calls the path, a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror</> that reflects the path, and a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>blade</> that makes the path!

20020092.text: Each object is kept by the other factions of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>, excluding the Soul Bridge.

20020093.text: Hmm... So I need to visit each of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sahos</> and get them?

20020094.text: That's not all, meow. Calling an Advocate is an important matter! You need to receive purrmission from a political authority.

20020095.text: What? Are you saying I need to go all the way to the Empire?

20020096.text:
Ugh, how dense are you, hiss? The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>! They repurrsent the Empire in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>, so they have that authority.
You just need to get the go-ahead from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>, mrrow.

20020097.text: So, we need to go find those objects and get that permission.

20020098.text: Well... I kept my end of the bargain. Then, I wish you the best of luck, purr!

20020099.text: Then, shall we get started with getting a hold of the objects? You can do it without me, right?

20020101.text: Haha, all right. Once you've gathered everything, meet me back at the base.

20020102.text: (He's not willing to talk to me yet.)

20020103.text: (I'd better find a way to earn his trust.)

20020104.text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> north of the base have been causing trouble lately.
The allied clans would have helped us out in the past... But things between us have soured, so it's not easy to ask them for a favor.

20020105.text: Why has the relationship gotten worse?

20020106.text:
I heard that the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> did something that made the other clans lose their trust in them.
It seems like something happened between the leaders... But everyone else working under them is suffering...

20020107.text: I can help out with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</>.

20020108.text: Really? I don't know how I can repay you... Thank you!

20020110.text: We're moving supplies from the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</>, but we really don't have enough workers.

20020112.text:
The allied clans were supposed to stay there, but for some reason, they left.
Since then, we've been diligently moving the supplies there... But it hasn't been easy with so few people to do the work.

20020115.text: You want to meet our leader? And who exactly are you?

20020117.text:
I don't care about this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> of yours. Why would the leader meet a nobody like you?
Get lost!

20020118.text:
Hmm, don't get me wrong. I'm not telling the leader about you just because of this present.
I simply got the impression that you must be an outstanding person. Hmph!

20020119.text:
From what I've heard, you have helped us <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> out quite a bit.
I doubt that you did it just out of the goodness of your heart... So, what do you want from us?

20020120.text: I need a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> to conduct the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.

20020121.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>? You want to call an Advocate? Hah! You're pretty daring, I'll give you that.
But, to receive a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>, you'll have to prove yourself. Do you think you can make it through the trial?

20020123.text: All right. Let's see if you truly have the skills.

20020124.text:
Hmm, you're not bad at all.
Fine. I will grant you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</>. Here, take it.

20020126.text:
I don't know if you will really call an <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocate</>,
but if you do, can you ask them this one question?

20020128.text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollows</> are wreaking so much havoc upon this world. Even though it is the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocates</>' duty to get rid of such impure beings, they refuse to show themselves. Why is that?

20020130.text: Here, take this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</>. Good luck with the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>.

20020131.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! We meet again.
What event did you ruin this time?

20020133.text: I'm kidding. What brings you here?

20020134.text: I'm looking for a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell that calls the path</>.

20020135.text:
A <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell that calls the path</>... Do you mean the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plum Blossom Bell</>?
May I ask why you're looking for such a thing?

20020136.text: I wish to conduct the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.

20020137.text:
You really plan to call upon an <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocate</>? You two are just full of surprises.
That's all fine and dandy, but...

20020139.text:
Our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</> is being held captive by the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>.
I'll lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plum Blossom Bell</> if you can get him back.

20020140.text: Can the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> get it themselves?

20020141.text:
We could handle this ourselves... but we're asking for your help since you're here anyway.
We've all heard about how skilled you are. I'll leave the job to you.

20020142.text: You've come. I've heard about what you wanted from my leader.

20020144.text:
We've had several clashes with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>, but it was never anything serious.
But this time, they kidnapped our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</>.

20020146.text: You can ask our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Elite member</> in the forest about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</>'s exact location.

20020147.text:
Welcome. I've been waiting for you.
I'll cut to the chase. Our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</> is being held <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>inside the Scarlet Masks' base</>. Please save our recruit!

20020149.text: This could become a problem between the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> if I interfere.

20020150.text: Does that mean that I have to do it alone?

20020151.text: I know it's shameless of me to say this, but yes.

20020153.text: Thank you, you're just in time.

20020155.text: The members sent me a signal, so I knew someone would be coming to help. It was a little strange... they should be able to save me themselves.

20020157.text: Do you? Let's get out of here first.

20020159.text: Was this the plan all along?

20020160.text: Oh... So you figured it out.

20020161.text: Did you use me to attack the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>?

20020162.text:
You are the great <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, after all. Yes.
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> have been getting more violent recently, so we were looking for a way to solve the problem.

20020163.text: But if we, the Plum Blossom, make a move directly, it might end up becoming a much bigger fight...

20020164.text: I'm pretty shocked I was used like this, but it was a clever scheme.

20020165.text:
Thank you for the compliment.
I know it's not much of a reward, but here. I will lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plum Blossom Bell</>.

20020167.text: I wish you the best of luck in meeting an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Advocate</>.

20020168.text:
Oh, look who we have here. It's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.
I heard that you were heading for <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>, but I wasn't expecting to run into you here.

20020169.text:
I came here to expand the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>,
but what brings you to Haewol? And why did you want to see me?

20020170.text: I have my own reasons. I need the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror that reflects the path</> to accomplish something important.

20020171.text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror that reflects the path</>? Do you mean the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>? Oh, my... You're really trying to call an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Advocate</>?

20020173.text:
Haha, since it's you, of course I'll help. But there's something that you must know.
The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</> is not something that's been passed down among us.

20020175.text:
It means you need to make it. The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</> is made from a special sand, and after using it once, it shatters.
You must make it each time you need to use it.

20020176.text: It's pretty simple to craft. As long as we have the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</>, the merchants will take care of the rest.

20020178.text:
That makes things easy. The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</> are...
Let's see, yes, you will be able to find them in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Disappearing Swamp</>.

20020179.text: There just happens to be a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>craftsman</> who knows how to craft a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>, so you should talk to him. I'll send word in advance.

20020180.text:
You must be the one that the Master mentioned.
Welcome. I will make the item you're looking for.

20020181.text: I'll leave it up to you.

20020182.text:
That's what I should say. Please bring me the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>black sands</> from the deepest part of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Disappearing Swamp</>.
There are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Mantises</> on the way, so please be careful.

20020184.text:
Phew, you've saved us! We came here to gather the sand,
but the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Mantises</> are blocking the way back. Please, you've got to help us out.

20020186.text: Thank you! Thank you so much!

20020187.text:
Oh, you've brought the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</>.
While I prepare <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>everything else</>, please process the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sand</>.

20020188.text: You can find the tools you need over there.

20020189.text: Here's the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>. Thanks to your help, everything went smoothly.

20020191.text: You're very welcome. I wish you the best of luck for your mission.

20020193.text: Long time no see to you, too!

20020194.text: How do you like Haewol so far? It's different from the East, isn't it? If you're looking for a job, I'm happy to introduce you to someone I know.

20020195.text: I'm looking for the blade that makes the path.

20020196.text: Are you talking about our treasure, the Soul Steel Blade? Well, sure, we can let you borrow it.

20020197.text:
Even if you look at me like that, I can't—actually, I can let you borrow it,
but not right now. Could you come back later?

20020198.text: It'll be too late by then.

20020199.text: Hmm... Then, how about this? Help me look for some materials. As soon as that's done, I will lend you the Soul Steel Blade.

20020201.text:
It seems we're on the same page, then! All right, then please bring me Darkhorn horns first. Since they're sharp and durable, they make wonderful materials.
You can find Darkhorns in the Windpath Valley.

20020202.text: I'll tell you the other materials I need afterward, one at a time.

20020203.text: (Whistling) You did a good job, collecting so many materials so quickly!

20020205.text: Wasn't it? I was so busy, I just lost track of the time. Alright, here's the Soul Steel Blade as I promised.

20020206.text: It's a precious blade made by the first master, so you must return it in perfect condition!

20020210.text: Long time no see to you, too!

20020211.text: The materials are ready, so now we just have to reveal <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>'s true identity!

20020212.text: I'm ready, so let's go quickly.

20020213.text: Great! Shall we head for the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>secret base</>?

20020215.text: How? That's easy, we just need to... Wait, how did we get there again?

20020216.text:
We don't actually know how to get there. After all, last time, we were kidnapped and taken there...
What do we do now? How do we get there?

20020217.text: How about we go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> at the Soul Bridge?

20020218.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>? Ah! Right, he can perform windstride to places we've been before.
Yes! Good idea. But... where is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>?

20020219.text: Ah, it's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! It's vewy good to see you again, meow!

20020220.text: The white-haired one is here too, meow!

20020222.text: Long time no see, meow! It must be fate fur us to reunite like this! Let's go and have a yummy meal, purr!

20020223.text: We can do that. By the way, do you know where <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> is?

20020224.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>, meow?
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> went with the other Barons to look for herbs, purr.

20020226.text:
You can get there by <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>following the sunlight</> from here, meow.
You can also try riding the wind, or following the smell of the flowers, mrrow.

20020228.text:
Why, meow? What better way is there...?
Ah! I'll bring you there, purr!

20020229.text: What? Th-that's not necessary! We can find the place ourselves!

20020230.text: Hehe, don't worry, it isn't scawy, meow! Let's go!

20020233.text: Why are you alone in such a dangerous place?

20020234.text:
I was gathering herbs with Grandpa <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>,
but then I got lost and was chased by <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>. That's how I got twapped here, meow...

20020236.text: Grandpa? Grandpa is harvesting herbs with the other Barons, mrrow.

20020237.text: Could you show me the way?

20020238.text: Just leave it to me. I should pay you back fur defeating those <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>, meow.

20020240.text: Baby! I was so worried about you. What happened?

20020242.text: Thank you so much. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, I owe you.

20020244.text:
I beg to differ. This warrior here said you were looking for 
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Edeta's secret base</>. Is that right?

20020246.text: It won't be easy, but if you have something from that place, I can channel that energy and open a Windstride path.

20020250.text: I was captured and held there with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> for quite a while.

20020251.text:
Hah hah. I see. I've never tried using a living thing for this purpose, but I'll manage.
You'd better brace yourself. Let me know when you're ready.

20020252.text: Are you ready? Let me show you what I can do.

20020253.text: What's the worst that can happen? Let's go!

20020255.text: All right, then let's go! Furlong, Furlong, Furloooonggg-ong!

20020256.text: It's a relief. I would prefer a safer method next time, though.

20020257.text:
All right, I get it. We'll try using a safer way next time.
So, now it's time to reveal <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>'s identity, right? Be careful not to get caught!

20020258.text: Where are you going? Why don't you come along?

20020259.text: I'm going to bring you proof that I wasn't just doing nothing while you were gathering the objects for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.

20020261.text: You'll see what I mean. See you in a bit!

20020262.text: Ma'am!? What is the meaning of this!

20020263.text: Is this what you meant by her true identity!?

20020264.text: N-no, this isn't how it's supposed to be...

20020265.text: Y-yes, if we pierce <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</> with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>True Sacrifice</>, she will reveal herself!

20020266.text: What crazy nonsense are you spewing!?

20020267.text:
Despite all this... she was once our leader.
Please let us take care of her last moments.

20020271.text: That's a relief. That means <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</> has...

20020272.text: She has revealed herself. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Orum</> is taking care of her.

20020275.text:
Actually... We've noticed strange behavior going back a few years.
However, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Orum</> said it was not right to doubt our leader...

20020278.text: Don't mention it... This was how it was meant to be.

20020280.text:
Of course! While you were gathering the materials,
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Orum</> and I worked ourselves to the bone to prepare this!

20020281.text: Ah, right! So what about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>?

20020282.text: Since the seat of the leader is vacant, I can conduct the ritual as the vice leader.

20020283.text: That's a relief. Then, I'll leave it to you.

20020284.text:
You two have done a great deed for our clan. Naturally, we will repay you.
The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Celestial Altar</> where the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</> will be conducted is back there.

20020285.text: I will follow you shortly after getting the required materials.

20020286.text: What the hell!? Parsha is just gone?

20020287.text:
Oh, my. Please calm down. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Advocates</> do not normally meddle in the affairs of mortals.
You should be glad that they were not angered by a mere mortal questioning them...

20020288.text: A mere mortal!? It's about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>'s mother!

20020291.text: Sigh, we went through all that trouble...

20020292.text:
I apologize for not being able to help.
It is regrettable what happened today, but if you ever need the help of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>, please call upon us again.

20020293.text: ...There's nothing we can do about it. All right, then.

20020295.text: Then, I will be looking forward to meeting you again.

20020298.text: Hey, cheer up! I'm sure there's something else we can try.

20020300.text: I'm going to go in search of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>... What about you?

20020301.text: I need some time to think.

20020302.text: Yes, I think that's a good idea. I'm sure you'll figure something out after you take a break.

20020304.text:
Oh, it's you! What brings you here?
Ah, how did the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</> go?

20020306.text: I see. You must've been looking forward to it. You must be very disappointed.

20020308.text:
Of course. You haven't had any rest since you've come to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>.
There's the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tranquil Woods</> south of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Foggy Forest Settlement</>.

20020309.text: I think it'd be a good place for you to relax.

20020311.text:
You're my savior. I was headed to the entrance of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</>
since I had some commodities to sell at the base.

20020313.text:
You're already in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tranquil Woods</>.
Ah! If you're looking for a quieter place, you can find it that way, deeper in the woods.

20020315.text: No, I should be thanking you!

20020316.text: Seeing that you came this far, you truly must be her child.

20020318.text:
As you might know already, your mother was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>, an Advocate like me.
She was a warm person who cared for all life and loved the world.

20020319.text: She must have been able to love your father because she was that kind of person.

20020320.text: Do you also know about my father?

20020321.text: Of course. Your father was a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>. And... he killed your mother.

20020323.text: It doesn't matter if you don't believe it now. You will eventually see it for yourself.

20020324.text:
We shouldn't have kept a corrupt being the likes of a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> by our sides.
But your mother... she embraced everything in the world. And that has led to this.

20020326.text: Look at yourself. Don't you already know the answer?

20020327.text: Is there any proof that he's my father?

20020328.text:
Have you seen the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Red Orb</> in your mother's memories?
That was something your father always wore.

20020329.text:
The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Red Orb</> fallen on the ground, and the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>'s existence...
There's no doubt that your father is the culprit who killed your mother!

20020332.text:
So you're saying that... you're a child born from an Advocate and a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>?
And the person... I mean, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> who killed your mother was your father?

20020333.text: Hmm... Are you certain about that?

20020334.text: What do you mean by that?

20020335.text: You must've seen your father in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>'s memory. Was it the same person?

20020337.text: Then, you can't be absolutely sure! Right?

20020339.text:
Of course, it is! Don't be so upset. Let's go and figure this out for ourselves.
If your father is a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>, we can call a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> to verify that.

20020341.text: Do you remember the Martial Arts Championship? You opened a Fissure back then.

20020342.text: Are you planning to open a Fissure and call a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>?

20020343.text:
That's right! Won't we be able to call a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> if we open up a Fissure like we did then?
Let's see... Yes, that place should do.

20020344.text: Now, will a Fissure open if we fight?

20020345.text: We fought at the Martial Arts Championship.

20020346.text: That should work, right? Well then, I'm counting on you!

20020347.text: It doesn't seem to be working, does it?

20020348.text:
That's weird. Why isn't it working? Perhaps it's because it's a different location...?
Ah, right! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>! It must because there's no <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</> here!

20020349.text: It's not just a matter of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>.

20020350.text: That's right. It's because of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>. Then, we just need to obtain <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>, right?

20020352.text: What are you talking about? If we're not talking about an Advocate's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>... Don't forget who you're talking to.

20020355.text: Welcome, sir. It's been a while.

20020356.text: Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</>! Or should I call you Elder now?

20020357.text:
It's already been half a year since I've become an Elder.
How long are you planning to stay away from the clan, anyway?

20020358.text: I also have something to point out. There's an old man who won't return my sword...

20020361.text: And this person next to you is...?

20020363.text:
Friend? A friend? What a pleasure!
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Master Aran</> finally has a normal friend.

20020365.text: Well, you could say that there's been some trouble.

20020367.text:
Uh... I made a promise with the Base Supervisor of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
I only did it so they'd owe me later.

20020368.text: Brother, you really are cunning. So, what was the promise?

20020369.text: I promised them that I'd eliminate the Nepenthes from the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Nepenthes Marsh</>.

20020370.text: That's simpler than I thought. Is that really all you want to say, though?

20020371.text: From what I know of you, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, there's something you need from the clan if you're here now.

20020373.text: I see. Then, I suggest you fulfill your duties as a leader before that.

20020374.text: Ugh. You're smiling while you're intimidating me into doing this? Fine, okay, I'll do it.

20020376.text: As you've heard, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</> have multiplied out of control and it's difficult to use the path safely.

20020377.text: How are they multiplying so fast?

20020378.text:
We're suspecting the weather conditions were just right,
but we're really not sure.

20020379.text:
The higher-ups made it clear that they don't want to spare any manpower to investigate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</>.
That's why we don't have enough people to handle this.

20020380.text: Then, should I help with the investigation?

20020381.text: We'd be entirely grateful if you could collect some samples.

20020382.text: The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</> should be a breeze. Right?

20020383.text: You shouldn't let down your guard.

20020384.text: Then, I'll leave it to you.

20020386.text: Thank you! I hope this solves the situation.

20020388.text: Now that the job's done, shall we go back to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>?

20020389.text: Actually, it looks like the path to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Lands</> is blocked right now.

20020391.text:
A wall of carnivorous plants has grown on the path to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</>.
Hah, we've been having all these problems since your return.

20020392.text: What does that have to do with me!? Sigh, what should I do?

20020393.text: We should find out the source of the problem.

20020394.text:
Then, we'll meet at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> when the problem has been resolved.
Before then, I've got other business to attend to.

20020395.text: Okay. I'll meet you at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> later.

20020396.text: Thank you! I hope this solves the situation.

20020398.text: Now that the job's done, shall we go back to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>?

20020399.text:
There seems to be something happening at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</>.
If you're interested, it might not be a bad idea to go take a look there.

20020400.text: Did you promise to do something for somebody again?

20020401.text: You came! Are you sure you're ready?

20020403.text: Then, we'll get going! Crew, to your stations!

20020404.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, is this your first time in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>?

20020405.text: Great. Then, leave it to me. Let's see, how about we go to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> Clan first?

20020407.text: Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</> is the same as always. He hasn't changed at all after becoming an Elder.

20020409.text: Is it? Come to think of it, I haven't changed, either. Haha.

20020410.text: Tell me more about what's happened.

20020411.text: Ah, haven't I told you? Well, I'm the leader of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>. It's because I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shiro</>'s Reborn, and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shiro</> is the founder of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>. I thought you already knew that.

20020413.text: I'm sorry. Then, let's catch up to Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</>.

20020414.text: (A mysterious energy exudes, but it feels familiar somehow.)

20020415.text: Shall we go and get some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>?

20020416.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</> isn't easy to get a hold of.

20020418.text:
Who are you? Judging by your outfit... could you be in the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Edeta Clan</>?
Why are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> attacking us?

20020419.text: Is this a joke? Aren't you the ones who attacked and injured our leader first!?

20020420.text: What? Are you talking about me dueling with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>?

20020421.text: Do you confess that you attacked our leader?

20020422.text: But she's not your leader. She's a monster!

20020423.text: Shut up! I will not forgive you if you insult our leader any further!

20020425.text: (This seems to be the place <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</> mentioned. Let's go in.)

20020426.text: Will you come back to your senses if we bring <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</>?

20020427.text: Master <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonwind</> is just as formidable! How dare you try to bring shame to Horyong's name!?

20020428.text: I'm the first to find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>.

20020429.text: But it was me who chased away the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spiders</>!

20020430.text:
Could you please give me half?
Ah, and please consider how long we've known each other.

20020431.text:
Like I said, I understand you need help, but it wasn't easy for me to get this, either.
Come on, when have I not done my best to help you?

20020432.text: Of course, of course. I know you're always helping me. That's why I'm asking you to help me one more time. If half is too hard, then maybe just a quarter...

20020433.text:
Stop it, you! This will just make us both feel uncomfortable.
I said I'll help you next time if I can.

20020434.text: If you say so. All right.

20020437.text: Mister! You said you needed <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>, right?

20020438.text: Have you come to fuel the fire? You'd understand since you've heard already.

20020439.text: I've come to put out the fire. Here, it's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider web</>.

20020441.text: But there's something I want to know. I'm looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta Clan</>.

20020442.text: All right, I'll tell you. But don't hold me responsible. You could find yourself in a lot of danger.

20020443.text:
You might cross paths if you go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>.
I heard that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Edeta recruits</> are seen there from time to time.

20020444.text: The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>... Ah, you brought some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>. Thank you, sir!

20020445.text: (There are clues that people have been here.)

20020446.text: Hello again, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. I heard that you were preparing the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.

20020447.text: Oh wow. How did you know?

20020448.text:
I have my ways. I suppose that means the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</> needs to lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Steel Blade</>?
Well, that won't be difficult, but I have a condition.

20020450.text:
We're currently researching to find a method to refine steel with the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illusion Soulfire</>.
I want you to collect what we need for that research.

20020452.text:
That should be enough <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illusion Soulfire</>. Now we need that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>plant sap</> to refine it.
Fortunately, we have plenty of Spitting Plants in the area. I'll leave that to you.

20020453.text: Do you need anything other than <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spitting Plant's Sap</>?

20020454.text: I can't really think of anything right now. But keep in mind that I may ask for one or two more things as our research progresses.

20020455.text: Thanks. You've gathered everything I asked for.

20020456.text: Can I borrow the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Steel Blade</> now?

20020457.text: Of course. While you were gone, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</> came by at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>.

20020458.text: Here it is, the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Steel Blade</>.

20020460.text: You'd better return it unscathed. Well, I wish you the best of luck.

20020461.text:
Haha, it's nothing like that. It's just a simple offer.
Before then, I've got other business to attend to.

20020462.text: I'll consider it, since it's <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</>!

20020463.text:
Thank you for saying that. Haha.
I'll be waiting for you at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> when everything's settled. Well then, I'll see you later.

20020465.text: (Although it seems a bit noisy for its namesake... this seems to be the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tranquil Woods</>.
